mapper.insert:
insert into `commodity` ( id, commodity_id, commodity_name, commodity_pic, commodity_detail, commodity_tbk, commodity_category, commodity_price, commodity_sales, commodity_rate, seller_id, seller_name, shop_name, shop_type, coupon_id, coupon_num, coupon_residue, coupon_detail, coupon_start, coupon_end, coupon_link, commodity_type, commodity_status, create_tm, creator, modify_tm, modifior, coupon_pay) values
